document.full_text: manchester city won the f.a. cup on saturday, ending years of mockery by its more glamorous crosstown rival, manchester united, even as united was claiming the premier league title.
document.title: global soccer: closing the manchester soccer divide
lines_and_colors: manchester city won the f.a. cup on saturday, ending years of mockery by its more glamorous crosstown rival, manchester united, even as united was claiming the premier league title.
